data.lyric:
[ti:Mahogany (Clean)]
[ar:Lil Wayne]
[al:Funeral (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mahogany (Explicit) - Lil Wayne (李尔·韦恩)
[00:01.72]Lyrics by：Dwayne Carter/Byron Thomas/Jeremy Fedryk/David Jackson/Eryn Allen Kane
[00:03.44]Composed by：Dwayne Carter/Byron Thomas/Jeremy Fedryk/David Jackson/Eryn Allen Kane
[00:05.17]Check
[00:05.78]Mahogany dashboard I do the dash board
[00:08.02]Gas to the floor I'm pressin' fast forward
[00:09.86]I'm racin' NASCAR transport just what you asked for
[00:12.57]Don't ask me what I asked for if you can't answer
[00:14.89]Now who them Xans for
[00:15.88]I'll pop dance for muscle relaxation
[00:18.15]I'm a patient pick up the pace
[00:19.57]When I feel too adjacent to who I'm racin'
[00:21.59]Yeah I'm spacin' I'm spacin' out oh you faded
[00:23.58]I faded out oh you make it I made it out
[00:25.62]But you shady like 8 Mile
[00:27.03]8 Ball from Orange my letdown
[00:28.95]I lay it down
[00:29.75]Like an eagle she spread it out
[00:31.11]Air it out yeah I ate it out
[00:32.47]I'm a Libra I weigh it out
[00:33.86]Hope the reaper don't take me out
[00:35.14]I'm too eager to wait it out
[00:36.54]Stuck the heater in Satan's mouth
[00:37.81]Pray police don't raid the house
[00:39.31]Pay my taxes and baby moms ain't no cappin'
[00:41.27]Don't play around hate me back and then hate me now
[00:43.37]In my lap is your face
[00:44.69]I got napkins to waste
[00:46.13]I got mansions with gates
[00:47.21]Feel like I'm NASA with space
[00:48.56]Don't feel like answerin' my phone
[00:50.04]I feel like thrashin' today
[00:51.30]I put my ratchet on safe and I feel actually safe
[00:54.28]Catchin' spasms from all the hands I done shake
[00:56.85]And all the cash I done counted and all the blunts I done rolled up
[00:59.88]I stun when I rolled up
[01:01.04]With a bad b***h sittin' in the front with her nose up
[01:03.79]You know what's in my soda
[01:05.16]And your trap house closin'
[01:06.75]Your glass house broken
[01:07.87]And my mad house open and my lighthouse open
[01:11.22]Mahogany dashboard do the dash board
[01:14.13]Mahogany dashboard do the dash board
[01:16.87]Mahogany handle on the gun in my hand boy
[01:19.51]Brains all over my mahogany dashboard
[01:22.27]Mahogany dashboard I do the dashboard
[01:24.77]I think in my backyard I need an airport
[01:27.71]Mahogany sand boy
[01:28.85]I start a sand storm
[01:30.42]Mahogany skin touch me I cut your hands off
[01:32.99]Mahogany door handle
[01:34.23]The master floor panel
[01:35.59]Mahogany sand mahogany Dior sandles
[01:38.61]Mahogany dash slime
[01:39.67]I might do the dash slime
[01:40.99]Sniffed the coke on the glass slime
[01:42.56]She started flat linin'
[01:43.74]Good times no hard times uh oh it's that time
[01:46.44]We at war I check my Chapal for the exact time
[01:49.16]Bang bang brrat time I'm reppin' bad vibes
[01:51.85]Flag high red red red bloody vampire
[01:54.65]Plug what the f**k on a rabbi no cap slime
[01:57.32]Judge gave me time I did that time like nap time
[02:00.28]Mahogany skateboard
[02:01.60]I parked the Wraith for it
[02:02.96]I kick push straight forward
[02:04.29]I hear Lupe flowin'
[02:05.67]Under the skudder these bright mahogany dreads showin'
[02:08.44]Let's get in bed and break these mahogany head boards
[02:12.98]Whoa mahogany whoa
[02:16.60]Mahogany dashboard I do the dash board
[02:19.38]Mahogany dashboard I do the dash board
[02:22.12]Mahogany dashboard I do the dash board
[02:25.97]Yeah I do the dashboard
[02:27.70]Mahogany handle on the gun in my hand boy
[02:30.44]Brains all over my mahogany dashboard
[02:33.80]Louis mahogany bags for the bag boys
[02:36.55]Louis mahogany bags for the bag boys
[02:39.77]Soon as we land on mahogany sand
[02:42.78]Mahogany sand
[02:46.75]Louis mahogany bags for the bag boys
[02:49.55]Soon as we land on mahogany sand
[02:52.44]I ain't arguin' I'm sayin'
[02:55.01]Ooh mahogany
data.trans:
[ti:Mahogany (Clean)]
[ar:Lil Wayne]
[al:Funeral (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.72]//
[00:03.44]//
[00:05.17]听着
[00:05.78]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[00:08.02]踩下油门 我一路狂飙
[00:09.86]我像参加汽车比赛一样 把你需要的好货送到你手里
[00:12.57]如果你无法回答 就别再追问
[00:14.89]谁还需要那些东西
[00:15.88]我尽情舞蹈 放松身心
[00:18.15]我耐心十足 加快步伐
[00:19.57]当我和角逐的对手近在咫尺
[00:21.59]你才找到兴奋的感觉 我已经慢慢清醒
[00:23.58]你刚有点起色 我已经功成名就
[00:25.62]可你就像《八英里》里的Shady一样邪恶无比
[00:27.03]从Orange Mound弄到点好货 失望透顶
[00:28.95]我让一切心悦诚服
[00:29.75]她像雄鹰一样展翅高飞
[00:31.11]我和她尽情放纵
[00:32.47]我是天秤座 我仔细衡量
[00:33.86]希望死神别夺走我的性命
[00:35.14]我充满渴望 迫不及待
[00:36.54]我敢在撒旦面前为所欲为
[00:37.81]祈祷警察别搜房子
[00:39.31]我按时缴税 养家糊口 我不会骗人
[00:41.27]别胡作非为 一直以来 恨我恨得咬牙切齿
[00:43.37]你的脸埋在我的双腿之间
[00:44.69]纸巾就能搞定
[00:46.13]豪宅守备森严
[00:47.21]我感觉翱翔太空
[00:48.56]我不想接电话
[00:50.04]今天我觉得备受打击
[00:51.30]做好万全准备 我觉得很安心
[00:54.28]朋友太多 握手握到手抽筋
[00:56.85]我清点了所有钞票 卷好了所有烟
[00:59.88]我想出门炫耀
[01:01.04]和美女坐在前座 她趾高气昂
[01:03.79]你知道我的苏打水里加了什么
[01:05.16]你的事业危在旦夕
[01:06.75]你不堪一击
[01:07.87]我的地盘畅通无阻 成为指路明灯
[01:11.22]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[01:14.13]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[01:16.87]小子 我手里握着红木枪柄
[01:19.51]在我的红木仪表盘上费尽心思
[01:22.27]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[01:24.77]我觉得我的后院需要建个停机坪
[01:27.71]小子 红褐色沙滩 
[01:28.85]我掀起风浪
[01:30.42]红褐色的皮肤 你敢碰我 我砍掉你的手
[01:32.99]红木做成的门把手
[01:34.23]镶嵌着红木地板
[01:35.59]穿着红褐色迪奥拖鞋走在红褐色沙滩上
[01:38.61]哥们 红木仪表盘
[01:39.67]哥们 我可以一路驰骋
[01:40.99]哥们 玻璃板上备好了狠货
[01:42.56]她尽情放纵
[01:43.74]美好的时光 从未品尝人间冷暖 时机正好
[01:46.44]我们一触即发 我看看表 确定时间
[01:49.16]我将XXXTENTACION的品牌发扬光大
[01:51.85]旗帜飘扬 鲜红一片 犹如饥渴的吸血鬼
[01:54.65]我生活的地方混乱不堪 我可没骗人
[01:57.32]法官给我判刑 我就当小憩一会
[02:00.28]红木仪滑板
[02:01.60]我停下幻影跑车
[02:02.96]我把滑板玩得出神入化
[02:04.29]就像我听着Lupe Fiasco的歌一样
[02:05.67]头巾下面 红色发辫引人瞩目
[02:08.44]让我们激情缠绵  把红木的床头折断
[02:12.98]红木
[02:16.60]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[02:19.38]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[02:22.12]红木仪表盘 我一路驰骋
[02:25.97]我一路驰骋
[02:27.70]小子 我手里握着红木枪柄
[02:30.44]在我的红木仪表盘上费尽心思
[02:33.80]红褐色的LV包包塞满钞票
[02:36.55]红褐色的LV包包塞满钞票
[02:39.77]我们很快就会到达红褐色沙滩
[02:42.78]红褐色沙滩
[02:46.75]红褐色的LV包包塞满钞票
[02:49.55]我们很快就会到达红褐色沙滩
[02:52.44]我不会争辩 我只会劝说
[02:55.01]红木
